Title.hackathon-idf: Hack Your High School - Île-de-France Hackathon

Description.first-line-shop: A full e-commerce platform with order management, Stripe payments, and an admin interface. Advanced cart system and inventory management.
Description.3x8-group: A modern website for a French production company, with smooth animations, responsive design, and SEO optimization.
Description.xplorafit: A full-featured website for a sports association, featuring a modern design and interactive animations.
Description.stop83: A sleek and modern website for a pest control company, optimized for SEO and user engagement.
Description.first-line-production: A modern corporate website for a Belgian production company, featuring smooth animations and SEO optimization.
Description.carolol: A dynamic and colorful website for a performing arts festival, focused on user experience and information.
Description.rentrez-dans-lart: A small dynamic website for a theater association, with smooth animations and SEO optimization.
Description.virtual-cook: A mobile app to find and manage recipes, designed for Apple Vision Pro. Built with SwiftUI (in progress).
Description.flowticket: A prototype web app to create events, sell tickets, and track attendance.
Description.hackathon-idf: Participated in a 24-hour hackathon organized by the Île-de-France region, featuring a CTF challenge and a penetration test on a test version of https://monlycee.net.
